City Council Members
====================

**The City Council is comprised of the Mayor and five Council Members. These dedicated public servants act as the governing body of Jacinto City. Each council member serves as liaison to one of five administrative departments within the city.**

**The City Council meets at the City Hall Annex located at 10301 Market Street. Regular City Council meetings are held at 6:00 PM on the second and fourth Thursdays of each month. Meeting agendas and minutes of past meetings are posted online at www.jacintocity-tx.gov.**

**Office Hours: Call or email for appointment.**

**Contacts :**

**1301 Mercury Drive**

**Phone : 713-674-8424**

**Fax : 713-675-8525**

| Council Member Name | Picture |
| --- | --- |
| Council Position 1 – Liaison to Parks & Recreation  Jimmy (JJ) Rivas  jj[@jacintocity-tx.gov](mailto:jimmy.rivas@jacintocity-tx.gov) |  |
| Council Position 2 – Liaison to Finance & City Hall  Gregg Robinson  gregg.robinson@jacintocity-tx.gov |  |
| Council Position 3 – Liaison to Police & Fire Departments  Allen Lee  allen.lee@jacintocity-tx.gov | [Lee](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Lee.jpg) |
| Council Position 4 – Liaison to Water, Sewer, Health & Sanitation Departments  Carmela Garcia  [carmela.garcia@jacintocity-tx.gov](mailto:carmela.garcia@jacintocity-tx.gov) |  |
| Council Position 5- Liaison to Streets Department  Mario Gonzales  [mario.gonzales@jacintocity-tx.gov](mailto:mario.gonzales@jacintocity-tx.gov) | [Mario](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Mario.jpg) |

![](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/logo.png)

#### City Hall

1301 Mercury Drive  
Houston, TX 77029
